duties_responsibilities.duty: Make and take phone calls regarding insurance, prior auth, and copay issues.
Coordinate medication needs and pharmacy insurance coverage for complex medical conditions such as HIV, rheumatoid arthritis, and cancer.
Respond to phone inquiries and address each with care, detail, and empathy.
Ensure services are covered under insurance coverage and talk to patients about their deductibles, co-payments, and authorizations.
Research issues on benefits coverage with pharmacist and doctors office and provide guidance to patients about medication coverage.
Handle multiple requests at any given time and document information from conversations in the computer system.
